name: Kinich
storytext: Fulfiller of Commissions, Flame Bearer of the Canopy.
source: Reward for inviting Kinich to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with him

skills.name: Canopy Hunter: Riding High
skills.descriptionraw: Select one of your characters, attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117091]</color> to self, and enter the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C117092]</color> state. Deal $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], then switch position with the selected character.
skills.descriptionreplaced: Select one of your characters, attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Grapple Link</color> to self, and enter the <color=#FFFFFFFF>Nightsoul's Blessing</color> state. Deal 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color>, then switch position with the selected character.
skills.description: Select one of your characters, attach Grapple Link to self, and enter the Nightsoul's Blessing state. Deal 2 Dendro DMG, then switch position with the selected character.

skills.name: Hail to the Almighty Dragonlord
skills.descriptionreplaced: Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#7EC236FF>Dendro DMG</color> and create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Almighty Dragonlord, Ajaw</color>.
skills.description: Deal 1 Dendro DMG and create 1 Almighty Dragonlord, Ajaw.
